website_summaries.verdict: The HP Slate 7 is an Android tablet that combines good looks with speedy performance, but its display just isn't up to snuff.
pros: Near stock Android, with unobtrusive customizations

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Tablet
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a basic, inexpensive tablet, then this will work for you. I've had this for approximately 1 month and so far so good. My uses are pretty standard (internet browsing, gaming, apps, etc.) Speed and interface seem to be pretty good, with a pretty good response rate. The battery life is pretty good, probably about 2-3 days with light to moderate use (about 2-4 hrs per day). I was considering some of the cheaper off brand tablets, but for a few dollars more I decided to go with the HP and am glad I did! So far this was a very nice little purchase with no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: TheOutlaw46

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it's not very good.
customer_reviews.text: I quit using it after only about a year. It's picture quality isn't that good, it's INCREDIBLY slow even doing basic things like checking email. It freezes constantly if you want to play games on it. I got a Lenovo instead and haven't used this one since.
customer_reviews.author: CaptiveHeart

customer_reviews.title: not worth ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality pictures. My second hp slate in a yr and my last. My first one took great pix, but charging port broke after 5 months. This one has windows etc, which was not interested in that, but maybe some are. But it works ok so far, but I have not used it much after learning about the pix. It will be my back up or for travel. The size is smaller than my last and no instructions or material in box. So it is used and you get just what you see. If you need help with setting up, have to go on internet and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: dr

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 months, but now it won't charge! Never dropped or damaged in anyway! Very disappointed in HP!
customer_reviews.author: Renee B.Kharboush

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice good working product but my problem it drains the juice fast. Please recommend an appropriate case because all I see are cases for the 2800 model and they don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Harri Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belated Graduation!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself as a belated graduation present!! I was sold just becasue I am a die-hard HP follower:) Expect nothing but great and or good things from this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins-Canada

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 4 stars because Angry Birds Star Wars II Telepods do not work this tablet. That's why I bought it. I am in no way suggesting that it's HP's fault. It is my fault for not checking first.
customer_reviews.author: theboz

customer_reviews.title: a very good memory, it is a good investment and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really very efficient, tremendous gift for my wife, a very good memory, it is a good investment and the price is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Tony W. Quiãones Ch

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tablet a few weeks ago and it sucks. The tablet freezes when playing games like subway surfers, angry birds, etc. The tablet gets hot quick and shuts down quite often. The tegra 3 processor is so slow. I hate this purchase and would not recommend anyone get this tablet. Save your money and get an ipad, nexus 7, nexus 10, windows 8 tablet, surface, or whatever else but don't buy this product. IT SUCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew magana

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I got this unit to entertain my grandchildren. It is working very well, I got one at the Base and the two grandkid's. I needed one more. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tablet, but, as I did, buy the plus version
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wassmuth

customer_reviews.title: Design looks good but the battery life is worst than I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Design looks good but the battery life is worst than I have ever thought of. From the day one I am having issue with charging port. Tablet is not getting charged properly. After 10-15 times of trying charger is getting connected. This ultimately turned out to be a bad deal for me. I am going to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dipta

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I need it to do. Great size to take just about anywhere, easy to read screen, easy to use, camera and video works great. Definitely an upgrade from my last tablet. A little slow on startup, but the battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Joyce Bara

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tablet for my 8 year old granddaughter because her previous tablet only had a rear facing camera. She likes to take pictures and this one had both front and rear cameras. She has no trouble navigating it. I would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Deloris C.

customer_reviews.title: A Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this HP tablet is a great bargain. It does everything I want it too and works great. I am very happy with this product and would recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Loudermilk

customer_reviews.title: Nice tab
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, my seven year old son absolutely loves it. I would have given it five stars but the picture quality could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Battery LIFE SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Pending a more elaborate review, but as a preview: DO NOT BUY! Battery LIFE SUCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing is now a paperweight. Do Not I repeat Do NOt buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson M.

customer_reviews.title: Both original and replacement stopped taking a charge with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Both original and replacement stopped taking a charge with the replacement going beyond replacement eligibility . Now I have to acquire a 3rd tablet for my granddaughter. Its not going to be an HP.
customer_reviews.author: maczmo

customer_reviews.title: The right tablet for you!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet I have ever used. Granted the stock memory isn't that much but with a 32 fb micro sd card this tablet really flys. I also use it to watch hulu plus, netflix, and crackle, the picture quality is perfect and never has to buffer. Extremely satisfied with this tablet, no doubt at all what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah fix

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but sadly you can't insert the Sim card for internet or telephone. Besides that it works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Juan O.

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow, WOW.....
customer_reviews.text: I received this tablet a few days ago, and was very surprise. Of the quality I have been using this tablet every since the battery life is great and the free appps r the best. Very easy to use and light weight so I can take it with me every where I just put ot into my purse. What a great tablet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Douglas-Quintey

customer_reviews.title: Better than a a pen/paper accident report notepad!
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not come with an owners manual, it still is an android based tablet and is perfect for my working needs. Small enough to fit inside most blazer jacket internal breast pockets, yet large enough to be viewed and used in my on the fly work needs. Would be nice if HP added an integral flash to the camera at some point.
customer_reviews.author: jason T. milam

customer_reviews.title: HP Slate Plus
customer_reviews.text: It's a great tablet with 7 hours plus of battery life. Great price for this tablet and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: PKing

customer_reviews.title: HP Slate Summary-Just my opinion
customer_reviews.text: If I had done my research better, I wouldn't have purchased it. It is OK but I wanted more and it just doesn't give more. It did not come with a user manual although I did find one online and download it. If you want the very minimal in operation, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and bought it at a good price. I am primarily a Mac person but wanted to have one Anderoid device around to check it out. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Review09

customer_reviews.title: HP slate 4200
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is so good, and my daughter whom I purchased it for just loved it. I thought it was going to be to small, when i ordered it and was ready to send it back but when it arrived I as totally surprised love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to handle and carry with me. The only thing I don't like it's that if I'm writing in Spanish it changes my words to a close one in English. It's not like my smart phone that saves the words and it's becoming bilingual. I can't be changing the language settings every time I write.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I bought it for my son and it is used daily. He will use it for his homework too!
customer_reviews.author: joyjoy

customer_reviews.title: goood one for  a  5 year old  girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used like new fro a 5 yar old girl......that ws perfect for her.....no need for apple
customer_reviews.author: moonsuneyes

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandkids to play games. Was much nicer than I expected. Also has a very nice camera. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: JGG

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Browsing and Netflix.  Horrible for Games.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value and I got my money's worth. Great for web pages as it renders even complex non-tablet streamlined pages very quickly. Netflix looks great. Perfect size for me. Not too big or too small. Games are not good on this. Simple games are OK but anything that does 3D runs unplayable. I kinda knew this but didn't think it was worth the extra money on a more powerful thing. The battery life is not good. In sleep mode it will drain the battery in 24 hours. I am OK with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fried Turkey

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: great tablet being I an not a tablet or computer guru I enjoy the ease of use and woyld recommend it toanyone.
customer_reviews.author: T gustafson

customer_reviews.title: HP Slate's
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three HP slates two were 7-inch and one ten inch. We have had difficulty with all three over heating and getting hot while charging, and sometimes going off for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Expected it to carry a sim based on the description but it does not . Need to be more specific on items cause persons expect to get what they are looking for in their search.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Pierre-Louis

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Vary fast no problems but every once in a while the WiFi kicks on and off nothing horrible though so I would give it 5 stars and I only pair 150$ I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: very fast.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel in hand made good and just the right size... The back can takes very nice pic. Also nice sound...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pedrotte

customer_reviews.title: slow  processor
customer_reviews.text: I thought a quadcore processor would be fast , On this Hp its not. My Mom has a dell with a Duel core processor and its a lot faster I dont like how the zoom works on it either you tap to zoom and its either to much or not enough zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R.

product_meta.title: HP Slate S7-4200US 7-Inch 8 GB Tablet (Slate Silver)
product_meta.description:
Count on powerful entertainment and more with the HP Slate 7 Plus 4200US Tablet. Get your game on, stream music and video seamlessly, plus browse the web fast. Images look sharp and vibrant on the 7-inch diagonal HD touchscreen. This tablet also has dual cameras, a front-facing one for video chats and a rear 5MP camera for capturing photos and videos.



KEY SPECS




PRODUCT OVERVIEW


ALL THE VERSATILITY. ALL THE VALUE. ALL YOU.
Get faster surfing, high-quality gaming and access to Google Play with the HP Slate 7 Plus Tablet. With extended battery life, keep playing music or watch a video on the brilliant 7-inch diagonal HD screen. Power up using an NVIDIA TEGRA 3 Quad-Core Processor. 



THIS PRODUCT HAS


The perfect size for wherever you're going

Sync photos across your PC, smartphone and tablet

Capture moments at every turn with rear and front cameras

Print from virtually anywhere with your tablet

Easily discover, sort, search and copy files from various sources

Gather your friends around to share photos, videos and games

Keep your email, social media, apps and the Internet close at hand

Get more done and have more fun without running out of battery

 

THE TABLET EXPERIENCE


Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean Use all your familiar Android apps and stay connected to your must-have digital content

Google Play Enjoy access to an ever-expanding world of music, apps, movies, and more

 

DO MORE WITH YOUR TABLET


Google SearchQuickly and easily find what you need

Google Voice SearchUse your voice to do what you need

GmailGet smarter email wherever you are

Chrome BrowserBrowse fast and bring your personalized Chrome with you

Google+Stay connected and share life as it happens

Google MapsNever get lost as you go to new places and old favorites

YouTubeMillions of videos at your fingertips, available on the go

Google Play BooksRead the books you love, everywhere you are

Google Play MusicPlay your music instantly, anywhere

Google Play Movies & TVWatch movies and TV shows instantly, anywhere

Google Play Magazines Read your favorite magazines, everywhere you are



IMAGE GALLERY




ADDITIONAL INCLUDED FEATURES


Built-in sensorMove and tilt your tablet for game time that's fully hands on

Micro USBQuickly transfer photos, music, and other files

Micro SD slotSimply increase your storage



SPECIFICATIONS


DISPLAY
7" diagonal HD multi-touch wide viewing angle display (1280 x 800)

MEMORY
1GB installed memory STORAGE
8GB eMMC PROCESSOR
NVIDIA TEGRA 3 A9 Quad-Core Processor BATTERY/LIFE
4000mAh lithium-polymer battery (up to 6 hrs, 30 mins of battery life)

OPERATING SYSTEM
Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean WEIGHT AND DIMENSIONS
0.75 lb, 4.8"W x 7.7"H x 0.4"D FINISH
Slate silver with soft-touch back panel WIRELESS
802.11b/g/n and Bluetooth WARRANTY
1-year limited hardware warranty, 90-day software support
